EmailTemplate.subject: Check your Reference status on the Staffing Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your status for the References section has changed: please action!
Thank you for filling in the reference section in ‘Essential Information’ on the Staffing Website, our HR team, have now started contacting the referees of all our seasonal staff.
What do I need to do?
The status of your ‘References’ section of the Staffing Website has changed from ‘Complete’ to ‘Incomplete’ as we encountered an issue with one or both of your referees. Further information about what actions you need to take are on the Staffing Website. Please login to the Staffing Website. All or some of the section has been unlocked for you to made changes to your referee(s) details.
For further assistance with your references section please contact your local staffing team quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence. Best wishes,
The Challenge
Email reference: CR 7.1
